effects: You gain Psionic Energy Dice (see the Soulknife Energy Dice table).
Any feature from this subclass that uses a Psionic Energy Die uses only these dice.
You canaTMt use a power that requires a Psionic Energy Die if all your dice are expended.
Psi-Bolstered Knack: when you fail an ability check using a skill or tool you are proficient with, you can roll a Psionic Energy Die and add it; the die is expended only if the roll succeeds.

Psychic Whispers: as a Magic action, choose up to a number of creatures you can see equal to your Proficiency Bonus and roll a Psionic Energy Die; for a number of hours equal to the roll, you can communicate telepathically within 1 mile (no action required).
limits: You regain one expended Psionic Energy Die when you finish a short rest, and you regain all when you finish a long rest.
The first time you use Psychic Whispers after each long rest, you dont expend the die; otherwise you do.

feature_defs.trigger: when you take the Attack action or make an opportunity attack
effects: You can manifest a psychic blade in your free hand and make the attack with it.
Homing Strikes: when you miss with a psychic blade attack, you can roll a Psionic Energy Die and add it to the attack roll; if it hits, the die is expended.
Psychic Teleportation: as a bonus action, you expend a Psionic Energy Die, roll it, throw a psychic blade to an unoccupied space you can see within 10 x the roll feet, and teleport there.
You gain the Invisible condition for 1 hour or until you dismiss it (no action required).
The invisibility ends early immediately after you deal damage or force a creature to make a saving throw.
limits: Once you use this feature, you cant use it again until you finish a long rest unless you expend a Psionic Energy Die (no action required) to restore its use.

feature_defs.trigger: when you deal Sneak Attack damage with your Psychic Blades
effects: The target makes a Wisdom save (DC 8 + your Dexterity modifier + Proficiency Bonus).
On a failed save, the target is Stunned for 1 minute and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
limits: Once you use this feature, you cant use it again until you finish a long rest unless you expend three Psionic Energy Dice (no action required) to restore its use.
